nodes.text: This member of the Tonith family was a male Muun who served as chairman of the InterGalactic Banking Clan. He was succeeded by fellow Muun San Hill. As chairman, Tonith worked with Hego Damask, who, unbeknownst to Tonith, was the Sith Lord known as Darth Plagueis. Before that, Tonith had worked with Damask's father, Caar.
